import React from "react" import memesData from "./memesData" export default function Main() { let randomMeme = "#" let button = () => { let meme = memesData.data.memes console.log(meme) let randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random(meme) * meme.length) let randomMeme = meme[randomNumber].url } return (
) }
